review_data.title: Viel Luft nach oben
review_data.content: Gewärmt und offen werden hier vier verschiedene Speisen zur Auswahl gestellt. Schnell ist es. Schmackhaft nicht sonderlich. Qualität?.

review_data.title: Schlechteste Asiat den ich kenne
review_data.content: Zu teuer, kleine Portionen, unfreundlich, 3mal das falsche Essen bekommen, Rindfleisch zäh und hart. Ob es überhaupt Rind war? Nie...More

review_data.title: Dinner, excellent food, self service
review_data.content: Small neat clean place, no service, take out or sit down. Fresh food, good quality, best value for money

review_data.title: The foods great!
review_data.content: Good value for money. Food tastes great is prepared fresh and is piping hot when you receive it. The restaurant has a decent variety of food for a range of dietary requirements including vegetarian.

review_data.title: Expensive small portions
review_data.content: Unpleasant staff. Long wait. Small portions. Expensive. Go somewhere else. It’s also not possible to order a side with the dim sum - which one would need. 5 small dumplings for 8 CHF. Small portion of rice on the side: 9 CHF. Poor quality meat.

review_data.title: never again
review_data.content: Hab Dim Sum bestellt Sowas unappettitliches hab ich selten gesehen. Fleisch noch roh! Hab alkes stehn lassen!

review_data.title: Never again — gummy bear meat and put sour attitude in the dishes instead
review_data.content: We were very hungry and decided to eat here, as it was the closest easy going restaurant and we wanted Asian food. HUGE MISTAKE! The two different beef dishes (Malaysian and Thai dishes) we ordered may have had some Asian ingredients in them, but really,...More

review_data.title: Good noodle soup
review_data.content: I had a pork noodle soup with udon noodles. Soup was hot and spicy. Service was good. No complaints. Place looks clean. I am going to return.

review_data.title: Sehr schlechter&unfreundlicher Service

review_data.title: Poor quality, small portions, miserable staff
